allow: Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "SHOW TABLES LIKE ''%estres%'';")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "SHOW TABLES LIKE ''%response%'';")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "DESCRIBE responses;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "SELECT id, intralaboral_form_type, intralaboral_total_puntaje, dom_liderazgo_puntaje, extralaboral_total_puntaje, estres_total_puntaje FROM calculated_results WHERE battery_service_id = 1 LIMIT 5;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "SELECT battery_service_id, COUNT(*) as total, AVG(intralaboral_total_puntaje) as avg_intra, AVG(extralaboral_total_puntaje) as avg_extra, AVG(estres_total_puntaje) as avg_estres FROM calculated_results GROUP BY battery_service_id;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "SELECT dim_caracteristicas_liderazgo_puntaje, dim_relaciones_sociales_puntaje, dim_claridad_rol_puntaje, dim_demandas_ambientales_puntaje, extralaboral_tiempo_fuera_puntaje FROM calculated_results WHERE battery_service_id = 1;")
Bash(curl:*)

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "SELECT id, section_level, questionnaire_type, form_type, domain_code, dimension_code, LEFT(ai_generated_text, 50) as ai_text FROM report_sections WHERE report_id = (SELECT id FROM reports WHERE battery_service_id = 1 LIMIT 1) ORDER BY section_level, form_type, dimension_code;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "SELECT id, battery_service_id, intralaboral_form_type, dim_caracteristicas_liderazgo_puntaje, dim_relaciones_sociales_puntaje, dim_retroalimentacion_puntaje FROM calculated_results WHERE battery_service_id = 1 LIMIT 3;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "SELECT COUNT(*) as total, intralaboral_form_type FROM calculated_results WHERE battery_service_id = 1 GROUP BY intralaboral_form_type;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "SELECT form_type, dimension_code FROM report_sections WHERE report_id = (SELECT id FROM reports WHERE battery_service_id = 1 LIMIT 1) AND section_level = ''dimension'' AND questionnaire_type = ''intralaboral'' ORDER BY form_type, dimension_code;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "SELECT id, battery_service_id, intralaboral_total_puntaje, extralaboral_total_puntaje FROM calculated_results WHERE battery_service_id = 1 LIMIT 5;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "DESCRIBE battery_services;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe":*)

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "CREATE TABLE consultants (id INT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, nombre_completo VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL, tipo_documento ENUM(''CC'',''CE'',''PAS'',''OTRO'') DEFAULT ''CC'', numero_documento VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, licencia_sst VARCHAR(100), cargo VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT ''Psic√≥logo Especialista SST'', email VARCHAR(150), telefono VARCHAR(20), website VARCHAR(255), linkedin VARCHAR(255), firma_path VARCHAR(500), activo TINYINT(1) DEFAULT 1, created_at DATETIME, updated_at DATETIME);")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "UPDATE battery_services SET consultant_id = 1 WHERE id = 1;")
Bash(if not exist "c:\xampp\htdocs\psyrisk\app\Views\consultants" mkdir "c:\xampp\htdocs\psyrisk\app\Views\consultants")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "SELECT id, nombre_completo, cargo, email, licencia_sst FROM consultants;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "SELECT id, nombre_completo, cargo, licencia_sst FROM consultants;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "SELECT id, consultant_id FROM battery_services WHERE id = 1;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "SELECT c.nombre_completo as name, c.cargo as position, c.licencia_sst FROM battery_services bs JOIN consultants c ON bs.consultant_id = c.id WHERE bs.id = 1;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "SELECT c.cargo FROM consultants c JOIN battery_services bs ON bs.consultant_id = c.id WHERE bs.id = 1;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "ALTER TABLE companies ADD COLUMN logo_path VARCHAR(500) NULL AFTER contact_email;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root psyrisk -e "DESCRIBE companies;")
